name: DLR.002 - Danglo - Adapt EP (12")
description: Danglo - Adapt EP (12") Second release by Dandelion Lotus Records, debut release of Danglo Coloured 12" Vinyl - Limited Edition - 500 Handnumbered INCLUDES: free Digital Download Code SIDE A SMITTEN CALL TO REASON SIDE B DID I LOVE EAGLE EYE + Free Bonus Track: Call To Reason (Remix) by Howse (Tri Angle Records) + Free Bonus Track: Call To Reason (IDES Remix) ------------------------------ CLICK HERE TO LISTEN TO THE RECORD ------------------------------ No creditcard ? Don't worry ! Bank Transfer payment, contact: info@dandelionlotus.com (Subject: DLR002-Bank Transfer) and include shipping adress. Customers in Brussels or London ? Free Delivery possible! Meet up in City Center. Contact: info@dandelionlotus.com (Subject: DLR002 - City Pickup)
